meanings.definition: Anatropous: (of an ovule) inverted so that the micropyle is at the opposite end from the funiculus.
meanings.sent1: The anatropous ovule had its micropyle at the far end.
meanings.sent2: The botanist studied the anatropous ovule under the microscope.
meanings.sent3: The anatropous ovule decided to do a somersault just for fun.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was anatropous, always looking at things from a different angle.
meanings.sent5: The anatropous ovule was like a tiny acrobat, flipping upside down.
